name: Carnivorous Sod
movement: walking and burrowing speed of 20 feet
description: The Carnivorous Sod resembles a patch of grass, capable of remaining motionless to effectively ambush unsuspecting creatures.
memorable: Its ability to absorb spells that enhance plants and gain temporary hit points makes it a unique threat in battles involving magic.
goals: To ambush prey by blending into its environment and to survive battles with the help of its special abilities.
relations: May be encountered in natural environments alongside other plant creatures or as part of a magical ecosystem.
environment: Typically found in grasslands or areas with abundant vegetation.
strengths: Immunity to poison and conditions such as blindness and deafness enhances its durability in combat.
weaknesses: Limited mobility with a walking speed of only 20 feet restricts its tactical options.
attacks: The Carnivorous Sod can bite for piercing damage and has a Grass Trip ability that can knock enemies prone.
most_powerful_ability: Its Spell Eater ability allows it to absorb spells that enhance plants, gaining temporary hit points in the process.
senses: Possesses blindsight to detect nearby creatures and tremorsense to sense movement in the ground.
additional_information: Uses False Appearance to blend in with grass.
Capable of dealing good piercing damage with its bite attack.
Ability to make a bonus attack if it didn’t move on its previous turn.
test_queries: plant that can absorb magical spells
carnivorous grass that knocks enemies down
